data.oai_dc:dc: Activity rate and community data for microcosm experiment

Information on activity rate for individual dragonfly larvae of different species, and the abundances of zooplankton and algae in associated habitats.The column titles are as follows:Habitat: the habitat affinity of each species can be to no-fish ponds (NF), fish ponds (F), or both (generalist, G).Species: the species epithet.Individual: an identification number for each larva.Activity: the movement rate of each individual in cm/three hours.Daph: The number of daphnids found in each sample.Cop: The number of copepods found in each sample.Alg: algal concentration measured using chlorophyll a.
